mapper.sql: RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, OBJ_VERS, OBJ_DESCN, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, CD_MAP_ID, MAP_DF_TYPE, CD_CNVS_TYPE, CD_MAP_TYPE, TGT_DMN_ID, TGT_DMN_PNM, TGT_DMN_LNM, TGT_CD_VAL, TGT_CD_VAL_NM, SRC_DB_ID, SRC_DB_PNM, SRC_TBL_ID, SRC_TBL_LNM, SRC_TBL_PNM, SRC_COL_LNM, SRC_COL_PNM, SRC_CD_VAL, SRC_CD_VAL_NM, SRC_BIZ_ID, SRC_BIZ_NM, SRC_SYS_ID, SRC_SYS_NM, SRC_UPP_CD_VAL, SRC_UPP_CD_VAL_NM, APP_CRGP_ID, APP_CRGP_NM, CNVS_CRGP_ID, CNVS_CRGP_NM, SRC_CD_DMN_CD

, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, OBJ_VERS, OBJ_DESCN, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, MAP_DF_TYPE, CD_CNVS_TYPE, CD_MAP_TYPE, TGT_DMN_ID, TGT_DMN_PNM, TGT_DMN_LNM, TGT_CD_VAL, TGT_CD_VAL_NM, SRC_DB_ID, SRC_DB_PNM, SRC_TBL_ID, SRC_TBL_LNM, SRC_TBL_PNM, SRC_COL_LNM, SRC_COL_PNM, SRC_CD_VAL, SRC_CD_VAL_NM, SRC_BIZ_ID, SRC_BIZ_NM, SRC_SYS_ID, SRC_SYS_NM, SRC_UPP_CD_VAL, SRC_UPP_CD_VAL_NM, APP_CRGP_ID, APP_CRGP_NM, CNVS_CRGP_ID, CNVS_CRGP_NM, SRC_CD_DMN_CD
mapper.insert: insert into WAQ_COD_MAP (RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, OBJ_VERS, OBJ_DESCN, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, CD_MAP_ID, MAP_DF_TYPE, CD_CNVS_TYPE, CD_MAP_TYPE, TGT_DMN_ID, TGT_DMN_PNM, TGT_DMN_LNM, TGT_CD_VAL, TGT_CD_VAL_NM, SRC_DB_ID, SRC_DB_PNM, SRC_TBL_ID, SRC_TBL_LNM, SRC_TBL_PNM, SRC_COL_LNM, SRC_COL_PNM, SRC_CD_VAL, SRC_CD_VAL_NM, SRC_CD_DMN_CD) values (#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cdMapId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mapDfType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cdCnvsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cdMapType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tgtDmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tgtDmnPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tgtDmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tgtCdVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tgtCdValNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcTblLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcColLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcCdVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcCdValNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcCdDmnCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT COALESCE(MAX(RQST_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM WAQ_COD_MAP WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}

update WAQ_COD_MAP
RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CD_MAP_ID = #{cdMapId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAP_DF_TYPE = #{mapDfType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CD_CNVS_TYPE = #{cdCnvsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CD_MAP_TYPE = #{cdMapType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_DMN_ID = #{tgtDmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_DMN_PNM = #{tgtDmnPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_DMN_LNM = #{tgtDmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_CD_VAL = #{tgtCdVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_CD_VAL_NM = #{tgtCdValNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_DB_ID = #{srcDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_DB_PNM = #{srcDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_TBL_ID = #{srcTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_TBL_LNM = #{srcTblLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_TBL_PNM = #{srcTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_COL_LNM = #{srcColLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_COL_PNM = #{srcColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_CD_VAL = #{srcCdVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_CD_VAL_NM = #{srcCdValNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_BIZ_ID = #{srcBizId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_BIZ_NM = #{srcBizNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_SYS_ID = #{srcSysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_SYS_NM = #{srcSysNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_UPP_CD_VAL = #{srcUppCdVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_UPP_CD_VAL_NM = #{srcUppCdValNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_CRGP_ID = #{appCrgpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_CRGP_NM = #{appCrgpNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CNVS_CRGP_ID = #{cnvsCrgpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CNVS_CRGP_NM = #{cnvsCrgpNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_CD_DMN_CD = #{srcCdDmnCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update WAQ_COD_MAP set RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CD_MAP_ID = #{cdMapId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAP_DF_TYPE = #{mapDfType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CD_CNVS_TYPE = #{cdCnvsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CD_MAP_TYPE = #{cdMapType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_DMN_ID = #{tgtDmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_DMN_PNM = #{tgtDmnPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_DMN_LNM = #{tgtDmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_CD_VAL = #{tgtCdVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_CD_VAL_NM = #{tgtCdValNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_DB_ID = #{srcDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_DB_PNM = #{srcDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_TBL_ID = #{srcTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_TBL_LNM = #{srcTblLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_TBL_PNM = #{srcTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_COL_LNM = #{srcColLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_COL_PNM = #{srcColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_CD_VAL = #{srcCdVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_CD_VAL_NM = #{srcCdValNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_CD_DMN_CD = #{srcCdDmnCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
--코드매핑정의서 요청서 리스트 조회 SELECT A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.RQST_DCD, A.RVW_CONTS, A.VRF_CD, A.VRF_RMK, A.OBJ_VERS, A.OBJ_DESCN , A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID , A.CD_MAP_ID, A.MAP_DF_TYPE, A.CD_CNVS_TYPE, A.CD_MAP_TYPE, A.TGT_DMN_ID, A.TGT_DMN_PNM, A.TGT_DMN_LNM , A.TGT_CD_VAL, A.TGT_CD_VAL_NM, A.SRC_DB_ID, A.SRC_DB_PNM, A.SRC_TBL_ID, A.SRC_TBL_LNM, A.SRC_TBL_PNM , A.SRC_COL_LNM, A.SRC_COL_PNM, A.SRC_CD_VAL, A.SRC_CD_VAL_NM , A.SRC_BIZ_ID, A.SRC_BIZ_NM, A.SRC_SYS_ID, A.SRC_SYS_NM, A.SRC_UPP_CD_VAL, A.SRC_UPP_CD_VAL_NM , A.APP_CRGP_ID, A.APP_CRGP_NM, A.CNVS_CRGP_ID, A.CNVS_CRGP_NM, A.SRC_CD_DMN_CD
, CASE WHEN A.RVW_STS_CD = '2' THEN '2' ELSE '0' END AS RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_STS_CD
, U.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM , CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' ELSE CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '5' THEN '#0000FF' END END AS FontColor FROM WAQ_COD_MAP A LEFT JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND A.VRF_CD = '1'
ORDER BY A.RQST_SNO
mapper.update:
--등록유형코드(C/U/D), 검증코드 업데이트 UPDATE WAQ_COD_MAP A SET A.REG_TYP_CD = (SELECT CASE WHEN A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' THEN 'D' ELSE CASE WHEN MAX(B.CD_MAP_ID ) IS NULL THEN 'C' ELSE 'U' END END FROM WAM_COD_MAP B WHERE B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND A.TGT_DMN_LNM = B.TGT_DMN_LNM AND A.TGT_CD_VAL = B.TGT_CD_VAL
AND COALESCE(A.SRC_CD_VAL, 'X') = COALESCE(B.SRC_CD_VAL, 'X') ) ,A.VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

--타겟(TOBE)코드도메인정보 업데이트 UPDATE WAQ_COD_MAP A SET (A.TGT_DMN_ID, A.TGT_DMN_PNM, A.TGT_CD_VAL_NM) = ( SELECT E.DMN_ID, E.DMN_PNM, D.CD_VAL_NM FROM WAM_CD_VAL D INNER JOIN WAM_DMN E ON E.DMN_ID = D.DMN_ID WHERE A.TGT_DMN_LNM = E.DMN_LNM AND A.TGT_CD_VAL = D.CD_VAL ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_CD_VAL D INNER JOIN WAM_DMN E ON E.DMN_ID = D.DMN_ID WHERE A.TGT_DMN_LNM = E.DMN_LNM AND A.TGT_CD_VAL = D.CD_VAL )

--코드전환유형 2(ASIS비매핑대상코드)인 경우 타겟정보 clear UPDATE WAQ_COD_MAP A SET A.TGT_DMN_ID = '' , A.TGT_DMN_PNM = '' , A.TGT_DMN_LNM = '' , A.TGT_CD_VAL = '' , A.TGT_CD_VAL_NM = '' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.CD_CNVS_TYPE = '2'

--코드전환유형 3(TOBE신규코드)인 경우 소스정보 clear UPDATE WAQ_COD_MAP A SET A.SRC_DB_ID = '' , A.SRC_DB_PNM = '' , A.SRC_TBL_ID = '' , A.SRC_TBL_LNM = '' , A.SRC_TBL_PNM = '' , A.SRC_COL_LNM = '' , A.SRC_COL_PNM = '' , A.SRC_CD_VAL = '' , A.SRC_CD_VAL_NM = '' , A.SRC_SYS_ID = '' , A.SRC_SYS_NM = '' , A.SRC_BIZ_ID = '' , A.SRC_BIZ_NM = '' , A.SRC_UPP_CD_VAL = '' , A.SRC_UPP_CD_VAL_NM = '' , A.SRC_CD_DMN_CD = '' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.CD_CNVS_TYPE = '3'
mapper.insert: --검증쿼리 : 요청서내 중복 코드매핑정의서(CDM01) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_COD_MAP D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.TGT_DMN_LNM = D.TGT_DMN_LNM AND A.TGT_CD_VAL = D.TGT_CD_VAL AND COALESCE(A.SRC_CD_DMN_CD, 'X') = COALESCE(D.SRC_CD_DMN_CD, 'X') AND COALESCE(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = COALESCE(D.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') AND COALESCE(A.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') = COALESCE(D.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') AND COALESCE(A.SRC_CD_VAL, 'X') = COALESCE(D.SRC_CD_VAL, 'X') AND A.RQST_SNO != D.RQST_SNO)

--검증쿼리 : 삭제대상 코드매핑정의서 미존재(CDM02) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_COD_MAP D WHERE A.TGT_DMN_LNM = D.TGT_DMN_LNM AND A.TGT_CD_VAL = D.TGT_CD_VAL AND COALESCE(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = COALESCE(D.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') AND COALESCE(A.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') = COALESCE(D.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') AND COALESCE(A.SRC_CD_VAL, 'X') = COALESCE(D.SRC_CD_VAL, 'X') AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U'))

--검증쿼리 : 요청중인 코드매핑정의서 (CDM03) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_MSTR E INNER JOIN WAQ_COD_MAP D ON E.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO WHERE E.RQST_NO != #{rqstNo} AND E.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND A.TGT_DMN_LNM = D.TGT_DMN_LNM AND A.TGT_CD_VAL = D.TGT_CD_VAL AND COALESCE(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = COALESCE(D.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') AND COALESCE(A.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') = COALESCE(D.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') AND COALESCE(A.SRC_CD_VAL, 'X') = COALESCE(D.SRC_CD_VAL, 'X') AND COALESCE(D.RVW_STS_CD, 0) != '2' )
--검증쿼리 : 타겟도메인 미존재(CDM04) AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN D WHERE A.TGT_DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM )

--검증쿼리 : 타겟코드값 미존재(CDM05) AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN D WHERE A.TGT_DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND D.CD_VAL_TYP_CD = 'O' ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_CD_VAL D INNER JOIN WAM_DMN E ON E.DMN_ID = D.DMN_ID WHERE A.TGT_DMN_LNM = E.DMN_LNM AND A.TGT_CD_VAL = D.CD_VAL )
--검증쿼리 : 소스도메인 미존재(CDM09) AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_ASIS_DMN_CD_VAL D WHERE A.SRC_DMN_LNM = D.ASIS_COL_NM )
--검증쿼리 : 소스코드값 미존재(CDM10) AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_ASIS_DMN_CD_VAL D WHERE A.SRC_CD_VAL = D.CODE_VALUE )

--검증쿼리 : 코드전환유형 1(ASIS매핑대상코드)누락된 소스(ASIS)정보(CDM06) AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.CD_CNVS_TYPE = '1' AND ( -- A.SRC_DB_PNM IS NULL OR -- A.SRC_TBL_PNM IS NULL OR A.SRC_COL_LNM IS NULL OR A.SRC_CD_VAL IS NULL OR A.SRC_CD_VAL_NM IS NULL ) AND CD_MAP_TYPE != '2'

--검증쿼리 : 코드전환유형 1(ASIS매핑대상코드)누락된 소스(ASIS)정보(CDM06) AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND ( -- A.SRC_DB_PNM IS NULL OR -- A.SRC_TBL_PNM IS NULL OR A.SRC_COL_LNM IS NULL OR A.SRC_CD_VAL IS NULL -- OR A.SRC_CD_VAL_NM IS NULL ) AND CD_MAP_TYPE != '2'

--검증쿼리 : 신청자만 수정,삭제 불가(CDM07) AND A.REG_TYP_CD != 'C' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_COD_MAP B WHERE DECODE(B.REG_TYP_CD, 'C', B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_USER_ID) != B.RQST_USER_ID AND A.TGT_DMN_LNM = B.TGT_DMN_LNM AND A.TGT_CD_VAL = B.TGT_CD_VAL AND COALESCE(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = COALESCE(B.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') AND COALESCE(A.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') = COALESCE(B.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') AND COALESCE(A.SRC_CD_VAL, 'X') = COALESCE(B.SRC_CD_VAL, 'X') )

--검증쿼리 : 응용담당자외 등록,수정,삭제 불가(CDM08) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_COD_MAP B WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.TGT_DMN_LNM = B.TGT_DMN_LNM AND A.TGT_CD_VAL = B.TGT_CD_VAL AND COALESCE(A.APP_CRGP_NM, 'X') != COALESCE(B.APP_CRGP_NM, 'O') )

--검증쿼리 : 변경일 때 변경된 데이터가 없을 경우 (CDM00) AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_COD_MAP D WHERE A.TGT_DMN_LNM = D.TGT_DMN_LNM AND A.TGT_CD_VAL = D.TGT_CD_VAL AND COALESCE(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = COALESCE(D.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') AND COALESCE(A.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') = COALESCE(D.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') AND COALESCE(A.SRC_CD_VAL, 'X') = COALESCE(D.SRC_CD_VAL, 'X') AND COALESCE(A.TGT_CD_VAL_NM, 'X') = COALESCE(D.TGT_CD_VAL_NM, 'X') AND COALESCE(A.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') = COALESCE(D.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') AND COALESCE(A.SRC_CD_VAL_NM, 'X') = COALESCE(D.SRC_CD_VAL_NM, 'X') AND COALESCE(A.SRC_BIZ_ID, 'X') = COALESCE(D.SRC_BIZ_ID, 'X') AND COALESCE(A.SRC_BIZ_NM, 'X') = COALESCE(D.SRC_BIZ_NM, 'X') AND COALESCE(A.SRC_SYS_ID, 'X') = COALESCE(D.SRC_SYS_ID, 'X') AND COALESCE(A.SRC_SYS_NM, 'X') = COALESCE(D.SRC_SYS_NM, 'X') AND COALESCE(A.SRC_UPP_CD_VAL, 'X') = COALESCE(D.SRC_UPP_CD_VAL, 'X') AND COALESCE(A.SRC_UPP_CD_VAL_NM, 'X') = COALESCE(D.SRC_UPP_CD_VAL_NM, 'X') AND COALESCE(A.SRC_CD_DMN_CD, 'X') = COALESCE(D.SRC_CD_DMN_CD, 'X') )
mapper.update:
UPDATE WAQ_COD_MAP
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd} , RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts} , APRV_DTM = NOW() , APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId} ,
WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND VRF_CD = '1' AND COALESCE(RVW_STS_CD, '_') != '2'
mapper.select: --신규 적재 대상 추출 SELECT * FROM WAQ_COD_MAP WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND REG_TYP_CD = 'C'
mapper.update:
--WAQ ID, VERS 등을 업데이트... UPDATE WAQ_COD_MAP A SET (CD_MAP_ID, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = ( SELECT B.CD_MAP_ID AS CD_MAP_ID , COALESCE(B.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1 AS OBJ_VERS , B.FRS_RQST_DTM , B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAM_COD_MAP B WHERE A.TGT_DMN_LNM = B.TGT_DMN_LNM AND A.TGT_CD_VAL = B.TGT_CD_VAL
AND COALESCE(A.SRC_CD_VAL, 'X') = COALESCE(B.SRC_CD_VAL, 'X') ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} --AND A.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능 AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_COD_MAP B WHERE A.TGT_DMN_LNM = B.TGT_DMN_LNM AND A.TGT_CD_VAL = B.TGT_CD_VAL
AND COALESCE(A.SRC_CD_VAL, 'X') = COALESCE(B.SRC_CD_VAL, 'X')
)
mapper.delete:
--WAM 삭제 (등록유형코드가REG_TYP_CD 변경, 삭제일 경우) DELETE FROM WAM_COD_MAP A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_COD_MAP B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND A.TGT_DMN_LNM = B.TGT_DMN_LNM AND A.TGT_CD_VAL = B.TGT_CD_VAL
AND COALESCE(A.SRC_CD_VAL, 'X') = COALESCE(B.SRC_CD_VAL, 'X') )
mapper.insert:
--WAM 추가 (WAQ 내용을 추가, REG_TYP_CD 가 신규,변경일 경우) INSERT INTO WAM_COD_MAP SELECT CD_MAP_ID
FROM WAQ_COD_MAP A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
mapper.update:
--WAH 이력 만료... UPDATE WAH_COD_MAP A SET EXP_DTM = NOW() WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_COD_MAP B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND A.TGT_DMN_LNM = B.TGT_DMN_LNM AND A.TGT_CD_VAL = B.TGT_CD_VAL
AND COALESCE(A.SRC_CD_VAL, 'X') = COALESCE(B.SRC_CD_VAL, 'X') ) AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.insert:
--WAH이력 적재... INSERT INTO WAH_COD_MAP SELECT A.CD_MAP_ID AS CD_MAP_ID , TO_DATE( '9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXP_DTM , NOW() AS STR_DTM
FROM WAQ_COD_MAP A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1'
